module.exports.lstatDir(dir, callback)

module.exports

Method Detail
<static> module.exports.lstatDir(dir, callback)
Runs fs.lstatSync on each item in the directory. 
 var path = require('path');
 var dirStatsSync = require('dir-stats-sync');
 
 var dir = path.resolve(__dirname, 'testData');
 
 function statCallback (item, stat, dir) {
     console.log(stat);
 }
 
 dirStatsSync.lstatDir(dir, statCallback);
Parameters:
{String} dir
Path to the directory to process.
{Function} callback
The callback will be given three arguments: the name of the file being stat-ed, the stat object, and the parent directory.
See:
fs.lstatSync
<static> module.exports.statDir(dir, callback)
Runs fs.statSync on each item in the directory. 
 var path = require('path');
 var dirStatsSync = require('dir-stats-sync');
 
 var dir = path.resolve(__dirname, 'testData');
 
 function statCallback (item, stat, dir) {
     console.log(stat);
 }
 
 dirStatsSync.statDir(dir, statCallback);
Parameters:
{String} dir
Path to the directory to process.
{Function} callback
The callback will be given three arguments: the name of the file being stat-ed, the stat object, and the parent directory.
See:
fs.statSync
